library(gpuRandom)
library(gpuR)
type="double"
nrow<-5
Nglobal = c(16,8) 
x<-vclMatrix(1:30, nrow=nrow,ncol=6, type=type)
xcpu<-matrix(1:30, nrow=nrow,ncol=6)
rowsum <- apply(xcpu,1,sum)
logrowsum <- apply(log(xcpu),1,sum)
sumr<-vclVector(0,length=nrow,type=type)
gpuRandom:::rowsumBackend(x, sumr,log=1,numWorkItems=Nglobal)
gpuRandom:::rowsumBackend(x, sumr,log=0,numWorkItems=Nglobal)
as.vector(sumr)
